BG3 Bard Tips & Builds

NEW SUBCLASS, College of Glamour, will be added in Patch 8. Choose your Bard subclass based on your party's needs. College of Lore is ideal for more spellcasting versatility, while College of Valour suits a more martial role. Bards have the Vicious Mockery cantrip, dealing damage and imposing a disadvantage on an enemy's next attack.
